name: NSColorPickerTouchBarItem
desc: A bar item that provides a system-defined color picker.

items.name: class func colorPicker(withIdentifier: NSTouchBarItem.Identifier) -> Self
items.desc: Creates a bar item with the standard color picker icon.

items.name: class func textColorPicker(withIdentifier: NSTouchBarItem.Identifier) -> Self
items.desc: Creates a bar item with the standard text color picker icon.

items.name: class func strokeColorPicker(withIdentifier: NSTouchBarItem.Identifier) -> Self
items.desc: Creates a bar item with the standard stroke color picker icon.

items.name: class func colorPicker(withIdentifier: NSTouchBarItem.Identifier, buttonImage: NSImage) -> Self
items.desc: Creates a color picker bar item using the supplied image as its icon.

items.name: var colorList: NSColorList!
items.desc: The list of colors displayed in the color picker.

items.name: var allowedColorSpaces: [NSColorSpace]?
items.desc: Controls the color spaces that the color picker can produce.

items.name: var showsAlpha: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that controls whether the color picker allows picking of colors with alpha values other than 1.0.

items.name: var isEnabled: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that determines whether the color picker is enabled.

items.name: var target: AnyObject?
items.desc: An object that is notified when a user interacts with the color picker.

items.name: var action: Selector?
items.desc: The selector on the target object that is invoked when a user interacts with the color picker.

items.name: var customizationLabel: String!
items.desc: The user-visible string identifying this item during touch bar customization.
